summary: Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue on Nintendo DS invites players to create their own fairy and fly into Fairy Camp and adventure through the English countryside and explore all new locations to find and grow the rare Rainbow Lily. Players will interact with Lizzy and team up with fairy friends to bring each of the six rare lilies to Fairy Camp. Along the way, fans will complete quests and take part in a wide variety of mini-games that will use specific fairy talents for arts and crafts, baking and decorating cookies and more. Connect to all the fun in Pixiehollow.com with new online connectivity features!

name: TimeSplitters: Future Perfect
summary:
TimeSplitters: Future Perfect is a first-person shooter video game developed by Free Radical Design and published by EA Games for the PlayStation 2, GameCube and Xbox video game consoles.

It is the third game in the TimeSplitters series, after TimeSplitters 2, which was released in 2002 (itself the sequel to TimeSplitters released in 2000). The game features a single-player mode consisting of levels where the player assumes the role of Sergeant Cortez, a time-traveling marine from the 25th century.

name: Tint The Saver
summary: A survival game where players capture and protect endangered species, facing hostile environments while maintaining rare wildlife. Cutting down trees and trash lowers the environment index, while cleaning up raises it. If the index hits zero, players’ health rapidly declines.

name: Ticket to Ride: Nordic Expansion
summary: Discover a new tale to tell as you set off to the northern reaches of the world! Build routes between colourful Nordic cities, claim the sprawling Murmansk-Lieksa route and earn the Globetrotter bonus in the world’s favourite train adventure game!

name: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands: Coiled Captors
summary:
Steel yourself as you travel through Vesper's first Mirror of Mystery to bring a merciful end to an ancient god! Tiny Tina's Wonderlands: Coiled Captors is now available, so get ready for this first chapter of post-launch content!

Eons ago, the Coiled naga got the biggest catch of all: an old god! They trapped the being within the sharp-toothed, leathery-skinned body of a mighty seawarg, caging it deep within an icy mountain. Only you have the power to free the humiliatingly named "Chums" from his fleshy prison—but doing so means wading through wintery wastelands, arid ruins, and flooding caverns full of enemies.

You're caught in the middle of a raging battle between slithering Coiled and angered denizens of the briny deep. The only way out is through.

name: Time Tenshi Paradox: Episode 2
summary: A mysterious visitor makes her appearance... but what is the enigmatic threat lurking in the shadows? Join Rose, Kyo, Tessa and Michelle in the second episode of Time Tenshi Paradox, an episodic visual novel series from Silver Cow Studio!

name: Tiny Pasture
summary: Meet your new little desk buddies! They’ll snooze, scratch, and scamper around while you work or study (don’t worry, they’ve been trained not to invade your workspace). If you’re good at animal management, they will occupy the bottom of your screen with different kinds and colors!

name: Ticy Adventure Club: Queen of the Spring
summary: This is a horror RPG puzzle game. In the game, players will play the role of a group of students who solve paranormal events as an extracurricular activity, investigating the case of the "Spring Queen" in Tissi City. As the investigation deepens, a huge conspiracy slowly unfolds...

name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Defenders of the Universe
summary:
Tiny Toon Adventures: Defenders of the Universe is a cancelled fighting game based on the Tiny Toon Adventures franchise. It was initially scheduled for release in mid-2002, but was cancelled for unknown reasons, despite having completed development. It was developed by Treasure and originally slated for the PlayStation 2.

On 25 February 2009, a ROM image of the game was released by a member of the Internet forum Lost Levels.

name: Tiny Racing
summary: A nostalgic top-down racing game with vibrant pixel art. Choose from unique vehicles, conquer constrasting tracks, and master different modes. With intuitive arcade controls, experience high-speed excitement and become the ultimate racing champion in this retro adventure!

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Super Tank MP100
summary: Tiger Tank 59 is a top-down shooting game. In this game, players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 100.

name: Tiny Troopers: Alliance
summary: Tiny Troopers return for their biggest war yet in Tiny Troopers: Alliance. Build and fortify your base and lead your troopers into epic real-time conflicts. Tactile controls give you full command over your infantry units, vehicles, and air units as you plot and execute lethal assaults in battles.

name: Time Raiders
summary: Time Raiders is high-octane arcade action in an 3D top-down shoot n’ loot with time as your playground. Battle through our past, alternate histories and the future. Seek out history’s greatest mysteries, wonders and dangers, and test yourself in thrilling combat.

name: Tinker's Ascent
summary: Jump to new heights in Tinkers Ascent, a 3D platformer adventure game. Collect, craft, and rebuild in this world of floating islands. The biggest thing to remember: don't look down... or maybe just don't fall down.

name: Tiny Golf Puzzles
summary: Jack Nicklaus, step aside! Tom Brinton invites you join him in the putting greens of the mind. A small, but entertaining puzzle game.

name: Tidal Rush
summary: Welcome to Tidal Rush, a casual yet adrenaline-charged water racer inspired by the golden era of kart racers. Hop onto your HydroSpeeder and race across exotic planets. Glide across dynamic waters, unleash tactical power-ups, and pull off daring stunts in fast-paced contests against AI, friends, or players worldwide.

name: Time is Solid Here
summary:
A long, yellow hallway. A floating head who talks of monster trucks and places in-between. A painting, three a plenty, each with someone in need of moving on.

Such is the horror puzzle game, Time is Solid Here, recently selected for the Goethe-Institut's Stillstand/Standstill Project Exhibition.

name: Tiny Sheriff
summary: Tiny Sheriff is a 2D movement platformer where you use weapons as a means of transportation. Master your movement capabilities to take on increasingly daring challenges.

name: Tintin Match
summary: Welcome to the wonderful world of Tintin! Get ready to assemble a beautiful collection of miniatures, and follow the famous reporter and many popular characters as he progresses through colorful match 3 puzzles. Unlock and collect the stunning locations where you can explore with Tintin on his travels.

name: Tiny Pasture: Baabaa and Moomoo
summary: This DLC introduces two adorable new animals—a sheep and a cow. Both are gentle herbivores, with the cow being chubby and charming, and the sheep sweet and cuddly! Don’t wait—welcome these new friends to your Pasture today!

name: Tin Tandem
summary: Climb the perilous heights with Axle & Arx and don't look down! Through speed, precision and teamwork, conquer their greatest challenge in the formidable platformer - Tin Tandem.

name: Timber Trails Alpine Puzzle: Expansion Pack 2
summary: In this DLC, explore 16 new puzzles in Timber Trails: Alpine Puzzle! Discover rustic cabins, towering pines, and snow-capped peaks in stunning alpine scenes.

name: Timeless Artifact: Mechanubis
summary: A sci-fi action-adventure in which you take control of a robotic Anubis with two shields. Explore the pyramid, go through challenging trials and uncover secrets in this experimental journey.

name: Tir-nan-óg II: The Sign of Chaos
summary:
The Sign of Chaos is a sequel to Descendants of Danaan, set in the same fantasy world based on Irish mythology. The legendary hero has accomplished his mission, but the forces of darkness were too strong, and as a result four kingdoms were engulfed in chaos, overrun by monstrous creatures. The hero travels to the land of Fianapia and teams up with the local princess to cleanse the country of evil.

The basic gameplay system is similar to that of the predecessor, relying on Ultima-like role-playing template with free-form exploration of a vast overhead map. Dungeons are viewed from a top-down perspective as well. Turn-based combat takes place against randomly appearing enemies on separate battle screens where tactical navigation is possible. Changes include graphical towns, character icons displayed during navigation, and the possibility to converse with or even recruit certain type of potentially hostile creatures encountered in the wilderness.

name: Tilefinder
summary: Tilefinder is an indie rogue-like turn-based grid RPG in which you slay hordes of monsters through a procedurally generated kingdom to find the legendary Tile shards! While excavating the castle, a floor tile came loose, releasing eldritch corruption that overtook the kingdom. Now, with the floor tile broken, it is your job to bring all the pieces together and assemble the Tile to seal the evil back where it came from!

name: Tim 7: Concours Pour New York
summary:
Tim 7: Concours Pour New York is an edutainment game focusing on 6e level of Mathematics.

The contents of the subject are:
Decimal writing - fractional writing: decimal fractions; multiplication and division by multiples of 10; arrangement of decimal numbers.

Operations on decimals: addition, subtraction and multiplication of decimals and decimal fractions; orders of magnitude and approximations; solving problems with decimals.

Division: dividing whole numbers and decimal numbers; solve division problems; divide with fractions.

Numerical calculation: calculate with and without parentheses; calculate with fractions; solve simple equations; learn to calculate quickly.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano MP017
summary: Tiger Tank 59 I: Volcano is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC includes map pack 017.

name: Tiny Planet Protectors
summary: Welcome to the TPPA! Your assignment: Protect, Clean, and Discover. Collect resources and encounter the inhabitants of nearby galaxies as you also fill your home planet with alien plants, futuristic tools, and uncover the greatest threat to the universe.

name: Time Thief
summary: This is a funny action game without language barriers. Operate the phantom thief Bunny Moon to steal the treasures of each stage, and watch Bunny Moon's fantasy adventure!

name: Timorese Dominatrixes Are the Best
summary: Experience a day in Timor-Leste with the hyperactive, hyper-sadistic, gleeful, terrifying, big-breasted, tanned Goddess Ana, who enjoys her work a little bit too much.

name: TimeNot
summary: This arcade platform game will challenge your skills to complete as many mini levels as you can before time runs out, with a minimalist pixel art style TIMENOT comes to offer a fast, responsive and accurate gameplay to platform games. Try not to run out of time.

name: Tiny Islands
summary:
Tiny Islands is a digital roll-&-write game that uses cards instead of dice for generating the random items you get to draw.

Turn the cards over and pick what and where you want to draw the items to create your own islands.

Mouse over the images on the cards to get a reminder of how each feature works.

Share a picture of your tiny islands along with your score with #MyTinyIslands and compare with other players.

name: Tiny Chaos
summary: Fast-paced Action Rogue-like. Fight Hordes of Monsters and Bosses. Survive, Level Up, Upgrade Attributes and Skills.

name: Timeless Heart VR
summary: Timeless heart VR is an action VR roguelike game, As the second work of Timeless Stories series, this work further simplifies and enriches the unique sword skill system of the series. Advancing in the unknown labyrinth with Lycanea, and break through this blockade from fate!

name: TimeOut
summary: Inspired by the gorgeous visual style of The Last Night , Bioshock and the concept from the movie In Time, TimeOut is an adventure narrative game made for a university final year project. All assets including art and programming were done by myself over a span of two semesters in the School of Arts, Design & Media, Singapore.

name: TitanReach
summary:
TitanReach is a modern re-imagining of old-school style MMORPGs. Veteran players will recognise much from the genre they love, while new features bring the game to life for everyone. The game focuses on a deep skilling system, massive fantasy open-world, engaging quests, and a complex, skill-based combat system.

In TitanReach you have the freedom to play the way you want. You can create a tanky sorcerer, a quick and nimble fighter, or even avoid combat entirely.

name: Tim Climpy's Warfair
summary: Indie Multiplayer FPS game in Early Access. Low Poly graphics, multiple gamemodes

name: Tiny Kingdom
summary: Forge your path from a humble farm into a majestic Kingdom, crafting your realm in a tranquil and enchanting card-based city-builder adventure

name: Tiny Chao Garden
summary: The version of the Tiny Chao Garden that has the minigame Chao Super High-Jump Game is included with Sonic Advance 2 and Nintendo GameCube Soft eCatalog Summer 2003. Cream and Cheese team up to get Rings, Cream moves a spring on wheels in order to spring Cheese up to get the Rings that fly across the sky.

name: Tinkers' Construct
summary: Tinkers' Construct is a mod for Minecraft about putting tools together in a wide variety of ways, then modifying them until they turn into something else. The tools never disappear and can be named and changed to your heart's desire. Once you make them, they're yours forever. Many different materials can be used to make your tools.

name: Titty World
summary:
A free "practice game" with characters from the webcomics "IT HURTS!!" and "PLEASE FORGIVE ME!!!"
Katie and Pasqualo have been sucked into a fantasy RPG. The goal of the game is: LOOK AT TITTIES?! Say WHAT?! Join the two girls (and maybe someone else too) as they reluctantly go through this game and try to get out! Believe it or not, despite the title, this isn't a pervy game. No actual boobs.

name: Ticket to Ride: Pennsylvania
summary: In a state full of railroad history, invest in the most profitable companies to develop your rail network. But do not let your opponents outbid you, or you risk losing the benefits of your investments!

name: Tiny Pasture: Ribbitribbit and Quackquack
summary: This DLC brings in two brand-new little buddies – a frog and a duck. With summer upon us, why not invite these lively water-edge chatterboxes over to cool down your desktop pasture?

name: Tim 7: Et Les Fouilles Interdites
summary:
Tim 7: Et Les Fouilles Interdites is an edutainment game focusing on 6e level of history and geography.

The contents of the subject are:
Ancient Egypt: the Nile valley in Ancient Egypt; chronological benchmarks; the powers of the pharaoh; the religion of the Egyptians during Antiquity.

Ancient Greece: Greek cities and colonies; Athenian democracy; the domination of Athens; the epic of Alexander the Great.

Ancient Rome: the Roman Republic; the Roman Empire and the Roman Peace; the Romanization of Gaul; religion and the Roman state.

The Mediterranean basin today: people around the Mediterranean; a natural environment: the Mediterranean environment; a metropolis of a poor country: Cairo; a tourist coastline: the Côte d’Azur.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Tiny Chao Garden
summary: The version of the Tiny Chao Garden that has the minigame Chao's CC Shoot is included with Sonic Pinball Party. Several red and green Colour Chips appear at the top of the screen and descend lower, with the player's Chao at the bottom. The goal is to remove as many chips as possible, releasing any Rings above them.

name: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands: Next Level Edition
summary:
Embark on an adventure full of whimsy, wonder, and high-powered weaponry! Roll your own multiclass hero then shoot, loot, slash, and cast on a quest to stop the Dragon Lord.

This Edition Includes:
-Full Game
-Optimized for Xbox Series X|S
-Dragon Lord Pack

name: Tiny Chao Garden
summary: The version of the Tiny Chao Garden that has the minigame Tomodachi Sagashi Chao can be downloaded from Sonic Adventure DX. The exclusive minigame has Cheese asking Sonic to help them find and gather 10 Chao friends to them at the top of the play area.

name: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands: Molten Mirrors
summary:
Break into a heavily fortified prison in Vesper's third Mirror of Mystery! Fight past the turrets, hammers, and furnaces protecting Fyodor the Soul Warden to shatter the chains binding his captive souls.
Deep within his mountain stronghold, Fyodor the Soul Warden lords over his horde of lost souls.
In order to break their chains, you'll need to work past his murderous mechanized defenses, including terror-powered turrets, blazing furnaces, and bone-crushing hammers. But keep your wits about you, lest you become yet another of his captive souls!

name: Timeworks
summary: Timeworks is a time-traveling 3D puzzle platformer with a bouncy cartoon style. Work along past versions of yourself to solve puzzles, create unique Items, and fill out your quotas for your mysterious employers.

name: Tides of Tethys
summary:
Tides of Tethys is an immersive underwater roguelite simulation game centered around exploring and surviving the uncharted depths of an alien world, while building and maintaining modular outposts.

Players will lead expeditions of Knights into the unknown, in the hopes of rebuilding their long lost kingdom and unifying the houses of Tethys once again.

As they dive further into the Abyss, they will discover compelling new places, uncover lost technologies, and conquer a variety of dangers that lurk beneath the surface.

name: Tim 7: Lance Un S.O.S
summary:
Tim 7: Lance Un S.O.S is an edutainment game focusing on 6e level of French.

The contents of the subject are:
Agreements: the plural of nouns; agreement of adjectives, verb and past participle.

Conjugations: the present and its pitfalls; future, imperfect and simple past; the past perfect and the past perfect; the main irregular verbs.

Frequent confusions: conjugated verb or common noun; infinitive in “er” or past participle in “é”; or/where; and/is ; his/are; a/to; upper or lower case.

Write the key sounds: the sounds [o], [f], [k] and the sounds written with the letters x, y and z.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Tiny Defender
summary: Tiny Defender is a game that combines CCG and tower defense. Build your own deck and clear various stages.

name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two
summary: You and your friend find yourselves trapped in two magical clockworlds where you have to solve puzzles to escape. Neither of you have the whole picture so the only way to get out is to communicate what you see to the other player. Play on two devices, local or remotely, all you need is a voice connection.

name: Tinkertown x Among Us
summary: After killing an entire crew and taking over their ship, an impostor mistakes a bright light in the world of Tinkertown for his secret haven, crash-landing on the planet. This opens up a brand new quest in Tinkertown where players can explore the crashed ship, solve puzzles blocking their way and escape with loot without getting caught by the impostor roaming the ship. Find a bunch of cool Among Us themed costumes, hats and decorative items and objects that can be used to decorate your houses back in your village.

name: Time Crack
summary: A thriller and mystery visual novel about broken trust and the search for truth, when a high-school student is accused of his parents’ brutal murder. Every choice might bring you closer to the truth... or end in tragedy.

name: Tinymon
summary:
Tinymon RPG is based in an isekai world that resembles Japan. The natives here speak Japanese, however thanks to higher powers you're able to communicate with them in English. Although, if you so wish, you can enable settings from the in-game menu that let you experience parts of the game in Japanese (or romaji). These settings can be toggled on or off at any time, so players that want to turn Tinymon into a full-fledged learning experience can enjoy toggling these settings on at their own pace, as they become more comfortable with their Japanese skills (which you'll have opportunities to learn and practice in the game). Of course, you can leave all of these settings off, and experience the full game in English. Alternatively, you can toggle all of these settings on, and experience the game in complete Japanese.
Tinymon's world setting is greatly inspired by Japanese culture, meaning you can learn about the real world Japan. Thus, Tinymon provides for a laid back experience that focuses on exploration, and education of Japan's locations, customs, culture, and language (to those that are willing). We will even teach you how to use the trains system, some things you should avoid doing in Japan, and the first things you should do after landing in the Japanese airport! (Some of them even should be done before leaving the airport).

name: Tied By Numbers
summary: A short Visual Novel that uses horror as a narrative device to touch on topics such as bullying, troublesome family relations and the importance of friendship.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Winter Assault MP048
summary: "Tiger Tank 59 I Winter Assault" is a top-down shooting gameIn this game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 048.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora!Tora! MP055
summary: About This is a shoot em up game , In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemy to win the game Feature The DLC include mission pack 055.

name: Timothy and the Tower of Mu
summary: Ascend the tower to save your grandfather in this classic, hardcore action-platformer. The Tower of Mu is waiting for you... Push past each check point to the next awaiting challenge; dashing, jumping, and slinging your way up to the towers peak. Die. learn. Overcome.

name: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands: Chaotic Great Edition
summary:
Embark on an epic adventure full of whimsy, wonder, and high-powered weaponry! Roll your own multiclass hero then shoot, loot, slash, and cast on a quest to stop the Dragon Lord.

This Edition Includes:

-Full Game
-Optimized for Xbox Series X|S
-Dragon Lord Pack Bonus Content
-Season Pass

name: Time Over
summary: Unlock the secret to unparalleled success through the power of teamwork!

name: Tiny Titans: Card Rumble
summary: Exciting epic chibi heroes and fast, tactical card battles!

name: Tibia
summary: One of the earliest and most successful massively multiplayer online role-playing games (MMORPGs) in history, Tibia is a two-dimensional tile-based game set in a fantasy world with pixel art graphics and a top-down perspective. There are currently 68 game servers online, of which 24 in Europe, 25 in North America, and 19 in South America.

name: Tiger Soldier I
summary: Tiger Soldier is a military-themed run & gun shooter game.

name: Time Barbarian Extreme!!
summary: Time Barbarian Extreme!!A fast-paced shooter, inspired by retro arcades of the past.A penguin from the future... a barbarian from the past... fighting for survival in a broken world... really messed up world... seriously look at the moon!Pew, pew, pew, nuff said.

name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Wacky Sports
summary:
Tiny Toon Adventures: Wacky Sports (Tiny Toon Adventures 3: Doki Doki Sports Festival in Japan), released in 1994 on the Nintendo Game Boy and developed and published by Konami, is the third Tiny Toon Adventures-related game for the system.

The player chooses either Buster Bunny or Babs Bunny and participates in their choice of sports activities, including baseball, soccer, or tennis. As Buster, they can also play carnival games set up by characters such as Shirley the Loon and Fifi La Fume. Carnival games include a watergun gallery and a beat-the-clock challenge featuring Elmyra Duff.

name: Titanfall 2: SteelBook Edition
summary: Includes Titanfall 2 standard video game and an official SteelBook, an Amazon Exclusive. A SteelBook is a limited, high quality, premium metal case

name: Time Foray
summary: Time Foray is a puzzle platformer where you control Macky Bürg in a mission to infiltrate into a mysterious complex by using her ability to travel back in time. With it, she's capable of creating time paradoxes that allow her to cooperate with her future selves in order to advance through the complex.

name: Time Rifters
summary: Be your own teammates in this unique single-player co-op shooter! You have 4 lives, destroy as many enemies as possible. With each new life you'll be joined by ghosts of your previous lives.

name: Time and Space Legacy
summary: Time and Space Legacy is a top-view puzzle game where you design and build your own space stations. Manage scarce resources, lay out buildings accordingly, and use advanced time-traveling technologies to save the future of humankind !

name: Tiara
summary:
Tiara is an exploration-focused narrative game where you play through a number of days (and dream through a number of nights) to uncover the story of Tiara's life.

The game takes place over an eventful month after Tiara has decided not to pursue the life her father wants from her any longer.

As you play through the days you'll encounter strange situations and surreal dreams with many mysteries to work out. Each day involves exploring a number of environments, interacting with characters, and working out game mechanics. These explorations will help you understand what occurred during this month of Tiara's life.

name: Tick Tock Isle
summary:
Tick Tock Isle plays like a puzzle platform game that relies heavily on story, character interaction, creative thinking, and poking.‬
In the year 20XX a confident, young horologist by the name of Strike is inadvertently transported into the past while attempting to repair a mysterious, abandoned clock tower. Endeavoring to return to the future, Strike must fix both the time machine and the island's dysfunctional family who are responsible for much of the clock's disrepair.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Rainstorm MP002
summary: Tiger Tank 59 I: Rainstorm is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC includes map pack 002.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora!Tora! MP014
summary: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. The player control a fighter to shoot down all the enemies fighter and all the enemies to win the game. The DLC include mission pack 014.

name: Ticket to Ride: Nordic Countries
summary: This new challenging vertical map will make you cross European Nordic Countries. From Copenhagen in Denmark to Helsinki in Finland, discover the snowy landscape by crossing Norway and Sweden. Succeed in building one of the biggest paths in the app.

name: Tiny Toon Adventures: The Great Beanstalk
summary: Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster and the Beanstalk is the only Tiny Toon Adventures-related video game released. Buster and the Beanstalk is a retelling of the Jack and the Beanstalk story starring Tiny Toon Adventures characters. The object of the game is to help two stars from the show, Buster Bunny and Plucky Duck, get into the Giant's castle.

name: tiny & Tall: Gleipnir Episode One
summary: tiny & Tall: Gleipnir, Episode One is a classic yet modern point'n'click adventure, inspired by LucasArt's legendary titles.

name: Tir-nan-óg III
summary: Tir-nan-óg III is a role-playing game, developed and published by SystemSoft, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: TIS-100
summary: TIS-100 is an open-ended programming game in which you rewrite corrupted code segments to repair the TIS-100 and unlock its secrets. It's the assembly language programming game you never asked for!

name: Tiny Tires
summary: Race around coffee cups and jump off notepads in Tiny Tires - a simple, fast-paced miniature racing game. A throwback to classic racing games, featuring a top-down perspective making it easy to keep an eye on any opponents trying to get one up on you.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Winter Assault MP044
summary: "Tiger Tank 59 I Winter Assault" is a top-down shooting gameIn this game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 044.

name: Tick Tack Puppet
summary: Action game with unusual controls. It's free now. Use the mouse to control the puppet's limbs and beat up invaders from outer space. Time slows down while you are not controlling the puppet. Dodge bullets, punch enemies, and move stylishly!

name: Tiny Plushie Shop
summary: A cozy story-driven puzzle game that features relaxing puzzle mechanics, a heartfelt story and environment customization. Sort magical plushies, learn the history behind the mysterious Cresswell legacy and join Kaitlyn as she faces her past in Wickwood.

name: Tinytopia
summary: Imagine a world of your own creation... in miniature form! In Tinytopia use charming toy-like structures to design your ideal city. Build a quaint town and grow it into a soaring metropolis.

name: Tiger Soldier I: MP044
summary: Tiger Soldier is a military-themed run & gun shooter game. Playing as a lone soldier, first by fighting off infantry units and battling tanks then lob a hand grenade into the enemy's fort, destroy the enemy's fort to clear game. The DLC include mission pack 044.

name: Time Warpers
summary: Time Warpers is the evolution of the popular incremental game Time Clickers. It combines the action of a first person looter shooter with the progression & upgrades of a clicker game.

name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Wacky Sports Challenge
summary:
Humor! Wackiness! Sports!
ls that what you're looking for? if so. this game's got it! Plus cool graphics.

STARRING YOUR FAVORITE TINY TOON ADVENTURES CHARACTERS FROM THE ANIMATED TV SERIES!!
You can play as Buster Bunny. Babs Bunny (no relation). Plucky Duck or Dizzy
Devil! You'll also run into your other favorite cast characters.

HIDDEN BONUSES!!! TWELVE DIFFERENT EVENTS!!! MULTIPLE SKILL LEVELS WITH DIFFERENT HAZARDS!!!
Face it. if you want a laugh riot. sports action. and tons of replay value. then this is the game you're looking for! Just check out those screen shots.

BUY THE GAME. PLAY THE GAME. BE THE GAME.
Besides. where else are you going to find Bungee Jumping, Chicken Race. Ice Cream Toss, Weight Lifting and eight other games in one convenient package?

name: Titan Isles
summary: Titan Isles is a co-op action adventure game for VR platforms. Join up to 3 friends to battle giant Titans with unique weapon and traversal combos.

name: Titanic
summary:
Titanic (also known as Titanic 2005) is an unlicensed NES/Famicom game made by Nice Code/Dragon Co. and published by Shenzhen Nanjing Technology in 2005.
It can also be found on certain plug & play systems, under a different name.
You can choose to play as Jack or Rose, and your objective is to escape the ship.

name: Tiny Frontier
summary: Crash-land on a forgotten frontier. Build your shelter, power your machines, unlock new tiles, and ignite towering beacons as the storm closes in.

name: Timberflow: Sawmill Simulator
summary: From a single tree to an entire industry! Manage and automate your lumber business in this relaxing, yet challenging Sawmill Simulator. Start small, grow rich, dominate the market.

name: Timmy and the Magic Pictures
summary:
Following Timmy's Sea Adventure, this is the second release in the Timmy's series of interactive stories, written by David Grossman.

Timmy finds that he can make the pictures on his bedroom wall come to life. This leads to many games and activities that improve reading and thinking skills : labyrinth, matching games, jigsaw puzzles and even play music with Timmy's xylophone.

In the options, you can set the levels of play (3), change the language and turn on/off the background music.

name: Titus the Fox: To Marrakech and Back
summary: Titus the Fox: To Marrakech and Back was released in 1992. The main character of the game is a fox. His beloved Suzy has been kidnapped on the other side of the Sahara desert, and to get her back he has to advance through 15 levels. Player's goal is to avoid dogs, construction workers, giant bees and similar creatures. The player can fight back by throwing objects back at them, or - most notably - picking walking enemies up from behind and throwing them as projectiles at other obstacles. The game features a code-based "saving" system, with the codes calculated uniquely for each machine.

name: Tiny Hero Courier
summary: "Tiny Hero Courier" is a game about Rupert, an ordinary courier in a tiny post-apocalyptic world, who must deliver the last packages, dodge hordes of fast zombies, and satisfy his boss. His mission? Survive, deliver, and keep his sense of humor intact

name: Tiny Hero Courier
summary: "Tiny Hero Courier" is a game about Rupert, an ordinary courier in a tiny post-apocalyptic world, who must deliver the last packages, dodge hordes of fast zombies, and satisfy his boss. His mission? Survive, deliver, and keep his sense of humor intact

name: Timberman VR
summary: Timberman, the devilishly addictive retro-style arcade video game goes 3D and beyond. It’s now available in VR! Take a deep dive into a game that is easy to learn but not-so-easy to master. Discover whole heaps of fun in a brand new type of reality - a virtual reality!

name: Tiny Toy Tanks
summary: In Tiny Toy Tanks you are in control of a small blue tank. Your Goal is to destroy all the opposing tanks in 40+ hand crafted levels. Opposing tanks have different AI with different strengths and weaknesses. Moreover, every level has many other mechanics like TNT, Magnets and more.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Black Hill Fortress MP091
summary: "Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, and defeat all the enemy tanks. The DLC include the map pack 091.

name: Time Gamers: 12000 Years in One Square Mile
summary: You have just been trained and certified as a "Time Gamer". Your first task is to travel back in time to the area of the longest running period of continuous human history in the United States. There, you must collect the DNA of extinct animals and important people of the past.

name: Time Gal
summary: The year is 4001. The evil Luna has stolen a time machine and plans to use it to take over the world. You are the Time Gal, a skillful and pretty scientist, and your mission is to chase Luna through different time periods, to get the time machine back, and to save the world.

name: TileUp
summary: This is a casual jigsaw puzzle game. All you need to do is use the mouse to drag the pieces to the correct positions, and when you complete the puzzle and form a complete picture, you can unlock the picture gallery.

name: Tiny Hands Adventure
summary: Join young t-rex Borti on his quest to find the best replacement for his tiny hands and arms. Explore several unknown worlds, find all the collectables and face bosses that have what you want.The aventure starts now!

name: Timo's Adventures
summary: Timo's Adventures is a platform game. You play as a chameleon who tries to flee from his Aztec temple. Expect high difficulty and amazing music levels.

name: TimeLost
summary: TimeLost is a Soulslike Team-Based PvP Arena Fighter. Master precision combat, customize your playstyle through dual-weapon builds, and climb the ranks in Arenas that transcend space and time.

name: Tile Jong
summary: Good tile?

name: Time Pilot
summary:
Time Pilot is a multi-directional scrolling shooter and free-roaming aerial combat arcade game designed by Yoshiki Okamoto, released by Konami in 1982, and distributed in the United States by Centuri. Debuting in the golden age of video arcade games, it is a time travel themed game that allowed the player's plane to freely move across open air space that can scroll indefinitely in all directions. The Killer List of Videogames included Time Pilot in its list of top 100 arcade games of all time.

The player assumes the role of a pilot of a futuristic fighter jet, trying to rescue fellow pilots trapped in different time eras. The player must fight off hordes of enemy craft and defeat the mother ship (or "boss") present in every level. The background moves in the opposite direction to the player's plane, rather than the other way around; the player's plane always remains in the center.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Winter Assault MP047
summary: "Tiger Tank 59 I Winter Assault" is a top-down shooting gameIn this game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 047.

name: Time to Rise
summary:
The game plays in a postapocalyptic world, it is designed to be a 1st/3rd Person Shooter. The player is sent to a small city to discover the mysteries and research what happened to the citizens.

The game will support Coop-Gameplay through local area network. There will be a level system and weapon customization.

name: Time on Frog Island
summary: Cast away on an island paradise complete with a cast of friendly frogs. Enjoy sandbox island life and explore at your own pace, solving sticky situations for your new friends and trading your way to fixing your ship!

name: Timeater
summary: Timeater is a 2D pixel art scrolling game with roguelike elements and a narrative focused on bending the time of the game to our will with a bilinear progression that will be spiced up with some gameplay/narrative secrets inherent in time itself.

name: Titan
summary:
Titan is a HD remake of the 1988 game by Titus France.

The great block breaker developed by Titus Interactive in 1988 is back with a brand-new HD version featuring superb 3D environments.

Locked up in an 80-level tower by a mad scientist, use your brainpower to help you to escape.
Armed with your pod (a cubic robot) and a metal ball, avoid the numerous traps and try to find the way out.

Titan is an innovative block breaker in which you control a cube at the center of the screen that allows you to move a ball in all directions and destroy the bricks.
In this game, it is not reflexes that count because you are inside an enclosed arena and the ball cannot get out.
It is brainpower and strategy that will carry the day. In each arena, different surprises and riddles await you... you will have to try to understand how to get out and, above all, how to avoid the traps. Some bricks can be destroyed by the ball, others by your pod. Teleporters allow you to navigate from one zone to another, the ice makes you slide, while mortal robot-pods try to hunt you down and traps try to destroy you...

This title was delisted from Steam on August 8, 2018

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Super Tank MP026
summary: Tiger Tank 59 I: Super Tank is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks.

name: Tiny Isle
summary: Tiny Isle is a cozy idle sim where you care for a magical island. Grow whimsical crops, collect sparkling crystals, and unlock fantastical new plants. Discover hidden secretsgiant fish, strange weather, island expansion, and charming residentsall at your own relaxing pace.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Winter Assault MP043
summary: "Tiger Tank 59 I Winter Assault" is a top-down shooting gameIn this game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 043.

name: Tiny Paws
summary: Your hand-drawn desktop pet digs while you work. Care on breaks. No timers, just cozy idle. Paw to paw, pixel to pixel, helping real animals.

name: Tierra: Adventure Mystery
summary:
Tierra: Adventure Mystery is a first person point and click graphic puzzle adventure, similar to games you may have played in the 90's or similar to a virtual escape rooms you may have played.
A simple gameplay interface consisting of the world that you explore and an inventory panel where you can collect, combine and use items you find along the way to solve puzzles. Explore areas, collect hidden objects and take in your surroundings. You will need all of your puzzle solving skills to put together a plan to make your way through the woods, solving riddles and down the many paths towards the secrets of Tierra. How you tackle the puzzles is down to you. Each puzzle has a logical solution, so take your time, there is no rush and enjoy the process of understanding what you have to do.

name: Tides of Tomorrow
summary: From the makers of Road 96, Tides of Tomorrow challenges you to survive the troubled ocean planet of Elynd, as well as the choices made by your friends and favourite streamers.

name: Tiny Glade
summary: Tiny Glade is a small relaxing game about doodling castles. Explore gridless building chemistry, and watch the game carefully assemble every brick, pebble and plank. There's no management, combat, or wrong answers - just kick back and turn forgotten meadows into lovable dioramas.

name: Timewell: Trail of Celestes
summary: Timewell: Trail of Celestes is an old-school story-driven 3D space shooter RPG. As A.I. SAT-V, explore exotic planets and fight with Constructs in an ever-deepening plot. Change her skills and adaptations on the fly. May you guide SAT-V to her destiny?

name: Time Crisis 3
summary: The third installment in Namco's light gun shooting franchise, Time Crisis 3 offers exciting, fast-paced shooting action by the world renowned VSSE agents as they fight to save an innocent nation from total annihilation. Choose from four weapons--machine gun, handgun, shotgun, and grenade-- to blast your way past enemies. Practice your sharpshooting skills in Sniper Combat and multiple gameplay modes. The game also includes multiple gameplay modes, a new playable character, and the original Time Crisis. It's time to warm up that trigger finger and step into the action.

name: Time of Heroes
summary: Time of Heroes: Strategy & Escape is an exciting strategy game where you must survive in a maze full of enemies. Navigate each level, avoid danger, and improve your strategy to become a more powerful hero with every attempt!

name: Tiny Village
summary: Raise dinosaurs, build valuable shops and complete amazing quests in your own prehistoric village! As you turn your tiny town into a bustling nation, upgrade your Magic Rock to unlock new buildings, dazzling decorations and the incredible Wonders of the World. Then show it off to the thriving Tiny Village community as you tip, share and make new friends!

name: Tiny Monsters
summary: Play Tiny Monsters for FREE to hatch, raise, and breed mysterious elemental creatures!

name: Timber Tennis
summary: A new addition to the Timberman family - a series of games enjoyed by more than 30 million players! Take part in the annual Timber Tennis world championships - beat the single player campaign and challenge your friends in the local or online multiplayer mode!

name: Tiny Kingdoms
summary: Tiny Kingdoms is a peaceful building strategy and puzzle game where you build an enchanting and ever-expanding kingdom by placing tiles on a hexagonal grid. Explore diverse, vibrant biomes, discover and unlock new tiles, and complete quests to bring your world to life!

name: Timberman VS
summary:
Are you world-class wood chopper? Enter the digital forest and find out! Discover the Nintendo Switch version of this classic, casual game - slice and dice trees in an arcade-style, challenge your friends and be the fastest timberman alive!

Timberman now features a single player challenge, to test your skills and unlock as much as 56 characters, and local games to have fun with your friends!

Grab your trustworthy axe, become a true Timberman, and chop trees in 3, unique game modes:

Classic Timberman: train your axe skills, gain exp to develop your account, and beat
your personal high score - in a classic, single-player, infinite tree mode. Chop as fast
as you can and avoid branches! Prove you're the REAL THING!

Hero mode: be the hero and rescue birds from their nest in a burning woods - gain
eternal glory and sweet loot! Can you reach the top of a tree and find a golden egg?

Race: join the race and be the fastest Timberman in a fun, tree-chopping
competition! Play with up to 4 players and test your chopping skills against others in
a crazy, fast-paced match! First on the finishing line WINS IT ALL!
Join millions of players playing Timberman, now on Nintendo Switch - featuring
brand new, exciting game modes, plenty of crazy new characters to unlock, and
more fun than ever!

name: Tiny Kitchen: Burger Edition
summary: Stack, flip, and drop your way to burger glory in this cozy physics-based cooking game. Whether you’re actively grilling or letting orders wait, Tiny Kitchen is perfect for focused breaks and relaxed chaos.

name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2001
summary:
Swing into action with the first-ever PS2 golf game from Electronic Arts in Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2001. In all, six pro golfers take to the green on three real-life courses including SpyGlass Hill, Pebble Beach, and Poppy Hills as they swing and putt their way through exact replicas of all 18 holes.
The varied modes of play are now supported by two new entries, Challenge and Play-Now, in addition to such returning staples as Match, Skins, and Stroke.

name: Tick
summary: A first-person horror game, the player will play a character who enters the dreamland, gather the necessary props to escape in the dreamland, and be careful of monsters during the chase. If you really can't escape, you can try to enter a deeper dreamland (but you may not be alone there)

name: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands: Glutton's Gamble
summary:
Vesper's second Mirror of Mystery awaits Fatemakers who are hungry for loot!

It takes a strong stomach to face the monster in Vesper's second Mirror of Mystery. Trouble is brewing as Imelda, the Sand Witch, unleashes her latest culinary creation—a potion that imbues her with a voracious appetite (and fearsome strength to boot).

To disrupt her devious dinner party, you'll need to retrace her steps, collecting ingredients for her latest recipe while trouncing shrooms, crabs, and the skeletal Gingerdead! Prepare to pepper baddies with bullets, flambé your foes with fireballs, and sink your teeth into a feast of chaotic fantasy combat!

name: Tiny Room Stories: Pure Escape
summary: This is a point and click adventure game with elements of the "Escape the room" mechanics. You have to solve many riddles and puzzles. Visit various places and locations, such as the "Tower of the Magician" or "Spaceship". There is no main story, only escape the room. Pure Escape!

name: Tides of Annihilation
summary: Tides of Annihilation is a fantasy action-adventure inspired by Arthurian legend. Uncover the mystery of an otherworldly invasion in a shattered modern London, unleashing hordes of enemies. As Gwendolyn, fight alongside spectral knights to save your family and piece a broken world back together.

name: Titankin: Prologue
summary: Inspired by Celtic mythology, Titankin Prologue takes you on a tight JRPG-style adventure where you'll meet plenty of colorful characters, wield the power of Titans, and enjoy thoughtful turn-based battles in a delightfully crafted pixel-art world.

name: TimeL
summary: Card and Rogulike,More And Free MOD.Card And Time,Different Card Type, and the core of memory card operation. The science fiction background runs through the entire game, suitable for multi-MOD development, free MOD production content, and create your own epic! !

name: Titan Shield
summary: Titan Shield is turn-based combat tactical game. Lead your party into the depths of the Titan's hold to deal with its owner.

name: Tiny Turnip
summary: Crank your way to the stars in

name: Timecop
summary: Timecop is a side-scrolling action game. This game follows Max Walker as he heads off on another time-hopping criminal case. The time criminal is Dr. Hans Kleindast: the original inventor of the time-travel technology that the Time Enforcement Commission relies upon.

name: Titan Station
summary: Far into the future, in the year 1999: David, a systems operator, runs from his troubles by taking a job on a space station. After arriving, his mundane work turns into a struggle for his very life as he makes a shocking discovery.

name: Time Heist
summary: You and your friends are part of teams of time travelers. Two teams compete with each other to reach their ultimate goal: the PARADOX THIEVES, who want to steal history's most precious treasures, and the GUARDIANS OF TIME, who want to restore time and prevent its collapse. To play, both teams must choose players to be their respective captains; only the captains are allowed to look at the screen during the game. For each mission, the captains must look the century and category of the desired goal and tell the other players, who will try to guess what it is and win the goal for them. The captains must alternate giving clues about the object to their respective teams, but, after a clue is given, only the oposite team is allowed to guess. Each team may discuss and is allowed one guess per turn. The team who wins the goal is on step closer to conquering time. There are three types of game modes: Fast, Regular and Legend. In Fast mode, players compete for the best out of three missions, in Regular, for the best out of five of missions, and in Legend for the best out of seven missions.

name: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands
summary: Embark on an epic adventure full of whimsy, wonder, and high-powered weaponry! Bullets, magic, and broadswords collide across this chaotic fantasy world brought to life by the unpredictable Tiny Tina.

name: Time Carnage
summary: Time Carnage is a VR survival shooter for HTC Vive and Oculus Rift. Traverse through time and wreak havoc through worlds swarming with zombies, monsters and prehistoric beasts. Armed with an arsenal of guns, time-stopping grenades and ludicrous cheats, it's time for the carnage to begin.

name: Tiger Heli
summary: The NES port of Tiger Heli, one of the first games developed by Toaplan and published by Taito Corporation in 1985. It is a predecessor to Twin Cobra. The player controls a helicopter named Tiger Heli taking out various enemies along the way.

name: Titanfall 2
summary: Titanfall 2 will deliver a crafted experience that explores the unique bond between man and machine. Playable offline, the single player campaign in Titanfall 2 will let fans step out onto the Frontier as a Militia rifleman with aspirations of becoming an elite Pilot. Stranded behind enemy lines and facing overwhelming odds, players must team up with a veteran Titan to uphold a mission they were never meant to carry out.

name: Tiny Worlds
summary: Idle game about using dragons to destroy worlds

name: Tideborne
summary: Swim through gorgeous, perilous waters where every safe moment ends in disaster. Outsmart predators, trick fishing boats, solve gentle puzzles, and guide your shimmering school of babies to the next fragile haven.

name: TimeK
summary: This game is a side-scrolling puzzle action game where the player controls time to navigate through obstacles and enemies while collecting items and reaching the goal.

name: Tiger-Heli
summary: Defend the skies in a challenging, 7800 adaptation of an arcade classic. This vertically scrolling shooter game was first released in 1985 as an arcade game, and has been ported to numerous other consoles, but never an Atari… until now. You’re in command of a highly-maneuverable helicopter with a mission to destroy enemies and collect points. Fly through 4 vertical stages and collect Mini-Helis along the way to boost your firepower.

name: Ticket To Ride: First Class Pack
summary: Discover Ticket to Ride First Class Pack, an expansion bundle for Ticket to Ride including all maps, and face new challenges with your friends! With this bundle, receive 9 maps and travel around the world. From Switzerland to the Legendary Asia, play with new mechanics : Stock Shares system, technology, tunnels, ferries, and more!

name: Timber! The Logging Experts
summary: Finally - a light-weight forestry simulation that doesn't need hours of tutorials to learn the basics! Easy to learn, hard to master is the key. Jump into your sophisticated machinery, get work done and enjoy the career mode.

name: Time Trap: Hidden Objects
summary:
Excellent Hidden Objects game! You set off on a journey around an abandoned town to unravel a mystery of a missing journalist.
A unique post-apocalyptic atmosphere and realistic graphics, ambient music, puzzles and mini-games will make your adventure unforgettable.

name: Time Machine VR
summary: Time Machine VR is an exploration adventure game. Travel to the Jurassic era and engage with creatures like dakosaurus and pliosaurus. Use high-tech tools to track, probe, and scan them, and upload your findings to the DinoDex to unlock the secret to saving humankind!

name: Tile Tales: Pirate
summary: Solve logic puzzles while following the journey of a mischievous pirate as he plunders his way across a mysterious secluded island in search of the ultimate treasure!

name: Time Trax
summary: The ZX Spectrum port has different graphics, no music aside from the intro screen, and different room layout.

name: Time Trax
summary: The MSX port has different graphics and room layout

name: Tiny Farm
summary: For a farm so small it fits in your hands, Tiny Farm is jam-packed with sweet surprises and endless possibilities!

name: Time Survivors: Chapter 0
summary: Chapter 0 for Time Survivors, the Most Historically Inaccurate Roguelike ever. Slay hordes of minions as Lincoln, Tesla, Cleopatra and other historic heroes with new unique abilities! Collect resources, unlock and enhance gameplay through our tree-based metaprogression. Forge your own epic journey

name: Time Lord
summary: It is the year 2999, and warriors from the planet Drakkon are launching a savage attack on Earth. Their weapon: a powerful time travel device. Their objective: to control us by changing the course of our history. To win this war, we must meet the Drakkons on a unique and dangerous battleground: our own past! You are a fearless fortune-hunter, hired by desperate scientists for an experimental journey into the 4th dimension. Your code name is Time Lord. Your mission: blast into the past to save the present from certain doom! Battle the aliens in four historical time zones. Search for weapons sent back by the scientists - and decide when to use them. Solve puzzles to collect the mysterious Orbs that hold the secret of time travel. Be cautious yet quick, Time Lord. You have one short year to free history or be history! And the evil Drakkons have all the time in the world...

name: Titans of the Past
summary: A deep party-based RPG. Crawl the dungeons. Battle monsters with your weapons, spells, abilities. Utilize the 'time flows as you move' system to make decisions. Loot, level up, craft, develop your town. Unlock new classes and races, spells, items - to make a party able survive the hardest challenges

name: Time Slip
summary:
On the reptilian planet of Tirmat, scientists have discovered a rift in space and plan to use it to transport the planet's inhabitants before the planet is extinguished by sending their elite army through the rift and invade their closest neighbor...Earth. However, to ensure their success they send their army into Earth's past in hopes of avoiding any modern weapons and increase their chances of saving their planet. However, Earth has learned of their evil plot and has developed a experimental time portal and has sent their own one man army to stop them.

The player takes control of Dr. Vincent Gilgamesh who has acquired a massive arsenal including pistols, machine guns, rocket launchers and many more heavy weapons and must travel through various time periods including Medieval times, prehistoric times, Ancient Rome and Egypt and even the distant future. The gameplay is similar to Contra where the player advances through the stages, shooting at various enemies and collecting power-ups and must also avoid various traps and pitfalls scattered throughout the levels. There are also the standard bosses at the end of each stage.

name: Tiny Garden
summary:
Tiny Garden, build your own magical garden inside a 90s toy
Plant your vegetables and trade them for furniture to customize tiny gardens in this delightful mix of farming, puzzle and strategy

name: Tinkr Garage
summary: Tinkr Garage is a Massive Multiplayer Vehicular Sandbox! Customize your own vehicle, race with your friends, roam the landscape, battle against teams and even battle against the hazards of the environment.

name: Timore Avaritia
summary: A horror game made by Vidas Games. Your uncle has been making an experiment called health potion, and went missing after that. Your task is to go findout what has happened to your uncle.

name: Tiny Kitchen: Pizza Edition
summary: Sauce it, top it, drop it! Build pizzas with flying ingredients and bouncy physics in this charming, low-pressure cooking sim. Tiny Kitchen: Pizza Edition is part chaos, part calm — all cozy.

name: Timequest
summary: Timequest is an interactive fiction game for MS-DOS in which players use time travel to venture into the past and correct temporal disruptions.

name: Tiny Aquarium: Social Fishkeeping
summary: A happy aquarium that lives at the bottom of your screen! Tiny Aquarium is a social idle simulator that keeps growing, even when offline. Hatch, sell fish, decorate, go fishin’, and visit your friends’ aquariums with bite-sized daily sessions.

name: TicTako
summary: Tic-Tac-Toe but it's on Ina's forehead and the loser faces her divine punishment.

name: Tiny Kitchen: Sandwich Edition
summary: Click to drop ingredients and build your own chaotic deli-style sandwich in this cozy physics cooking game. Stack it tall, stack it wrong — just don’t forget the bread!

name: Tiny Train Tycoon
summary: Build a toy railway from limited pieces, launch trains, and solve logistical challenges. Tackle economic puzzles or relax in sandbox mode — the choice is yours.

name: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas: The Pumpkin King
summary: Much to the dismay of Jack Skellington and the citizens of Halloween Town, unusual bugs have started to infest their township. At the root of this ever-increasing bug invasion is Oogie Boogie, a former holiday king who is determined to take over Halloween. With help from his friends Sally, the mayor, and Dr. Finklestein, Jack and his trusted pal Zero embark on a quest to rid the town of bugs and stop Oogie Boogie from carrying out his evil plot. As Jack, you must battle Oogie's creepy henchmen using an arsenal of different weapons and navigate through booby traps, mazes, and puzzles.

name: Time Snatcher Handy
summary: The universe's greatest cat burglar? The ultimate phantom thief across dimensions? Nah... Time Snatcher Handy, that's me! A time-stop bullet-hell action roguelike starring "Handy" the stylish cat burglar! Stop the time to dodge bullets, gather items to get stronger, and escape the Time Museum!

name: Tiny Bullets
summary: Tiny Bullets is an action-adventure game that plays remarkably similar to Tomb Raider. Horin has a variety of actions he can perform, including jumping, climbing, swinging on poles, pushing blocks, shooting things with his slingshot, and even picking up and throwing small objects. Making his way through different areas, he must fight with monsters, as well as avoid and escape traps. He can also find and store a variety of items, including keys and healing items to keep his health up. There is even an option to get hints on the current stage if you get stuck.

name: Titan Quest
summary: Titan Quest is an action role playing hack and slash video game developed by Iron Lore Entertainment. It was released worldwide by THQ on June 26, 2006. The game was released on Steam, along with the expansion Titan Quest: Immortal Throne, on July 17, 2007. The game is also available via Impulse, GamersGate, GameTap, Direct2Drive and OnLive. In 2013, the IP for Titan Quest, along with most of THQ's other games was purchased by Nordic Games.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora!Tora!
summary: The game's system is somewhere between air combat and army warfare. It's a lot like the old game I played as a kid, and we control fighters to destroy the enemy's army. We crossed the line of fire and shot down one enemy after another.

name: Tick Hop
summary: "Tick Hop" is a time-based puzzle platformer where players control the Guardian of Time. Navigate through levels made of time fragments, solving challenges and unlocking the past to restore the future. Manage a dynamic countdown and use time-altering items to overcome obstacles.

name: Time Loader: First Memories
summary: Time Loader: First Memories is a story-driven puzzle-platformer with tiny robots, alternate realities, nostalgic music, and primitive tech from the 90s!

name: Tibetan Quest: Beyond the World's End
summary: Tibetan Quest: Beyond the Worlds End is a captivating hidden object game that blends together the elements of the thriller and adventure genres with oriental esotericism and lore.

name: Tiny Cats
summary: Tiny Cats is a mysterious hidden cat-detective game where you need to find all the hidden and deeply hidden cats in the mansion. Save each cat from the mysterious magic that keeps them trapped inside. And uncover the mystery of your late aunt's house.

name: Tiny Auto Knights
summary: An asynchronous PvP Auto Battler where you have to recruit and upgrade heroes and place them strategically on the battlefield to compete against other players.

name: Tin Lord
summary: Tin Lord is a hybrid of RTS and Tower Defense in a post-apocalyptic world where you control robots that rebuild technology and fight monsters in a destroyed world.

name: Timeless: The Forgotten Town - Collector's Edition
summary: Escape from a town that is lost in time and space! Explore the mysterious city and solve its riddles to make it home!

name: Time to Strike
summary: Time to Strike is busted build bullet hell roguelike. Create overpowered builds and break the game by collecting powerful weapons, modifying them with whacky mods and discovering crazy synergies!

name: Tiny Machinery: Lost Reality
summary: You've been kidnapped by unknown scientists and your brain has been plugged into a sophisticated machine to run an experiment: travel into a virtual dimension to unlock weird machinery.

name: Tiny Onion Knight
summary: Tiny Onion Knight is an action-platformer about a little onion knight who travels through a mystical forest.

name: Tiny Terraces
summary: A cozy idle farming game, watch tiny guys do tasks around the terrace, expand, progress, and decorate your Tiny Terrace.

name: Tides of the Endless
summary: This Action RPG is finally here. Dive into intense battles where you can seamlessly switch between different Avatars in real-time, Master the unique abilities of each Avatar and craft your own fighting style as you progress through the game.

name: Tide: 1927
summary: In the 16th year of the Republic of China, Shanghai. Bai Youfu, a young girl who was dissatisfied with the arranged marriage, saw the news of her fiancé's murder in the newspaper one day, pointing to the innocent woman as the murderer. In order to protect her father, she decides to leave home.

name: Titan Quest: Ragnarök
summary:
"At long last, Titan Quest continues its epic journey through the world of antiquity. A mysterious threat calls the heroes of Hades to the uncharted lands of northern Europe, where new enemies await and new powers and treasures are waiting to be found!

This new expansion to the acclaimed Anniversary Edition of Titan Quest adds a fifth act of unprecedented scope, along with many new and requested features including new weapon types and a 10th Mastery for your characters to learn."

name: TimeLab: LZ 129 Hindenburg
summary: Embark on a journey aboard the legendary airship Hindenburg in the year 1936. Walk through the luxurious passenger decks, marvel at old New York as the Hindenburg floats above the skyscrapers, and witness its final voyage...

name: Time Idle RPG
summary: Idle RPG game that uses real life Time as the core mechanic and currency. Featuring offline progress, prestige, unfolding mechanics, trees, and much more!

name: Tint n Ink
summary:
Tint n Ink is a first person shooter videogame about Paintball, fight & hit your rivals and get fun everytime.

Find strategies, use the best techniques and create amazing tactics to destroy your opponents.

name: Titan Quest: Immortal Throne
summary: Titan Quest: Immortal Throne is an expansion to the 2006 action role-playing hack and slash video game Titan Quest developed by Iron Lore Entertainment. Like Titan Quest, Immortal Throne is a single player and multiplayer game taking place in a fantastic world based on Greek mythology.

name: Timore 5
summary:
Timore 5 is an indie horror game, 5th one in Timore series. 
A scientist named Frank has done a lot inventing new things, but his experiments aren't without the consequences. In this game Frank will try to record his dreams and convert them to computer data, allowing him to review his dreams later, but the experiment might not go as planned...

name: Timeframe
summary: Time is relative. Sometimes 10 seconds can feel like an eternity... In TIMEframe you will discover a world in slow motion. Explore the remnants of a mysterious civilization on the brink of destruction.

name: Tilemancer Dungeon
summary: Tilemancer dungeon is a minimalist dungeon crawler - card game where you create & explore your own dungeon. Create your own path, fight your way through the dungeon, gear up and claim the dungeon to become the next Tilemancer !

name: Tilesweeper
summary: Tilesweeper is a well-known game Minesweeper, but with amazing stylized graphics and a new game mode - arcade.

name: Titan Quest: Atlantis
summary: Play a classic Titan Quest adventure in single player or with up to 6 players in co-op. Survive the Tartarus, an endless, wave-based challenge mode. Unlock new skills, spend all your excess in-game money on random loot and enjoy graphic and QOL improvements!

name: Titan Quest Anniversary Edition
summary: For its 10 year anniversary, Titan Quest will shine in new splendour. This Anniversary Edition combines both Titan Quest and Titan Quest Immortal Throne in one game, and has been given a massive overhaul for the ultimate ARPG experience.

name: TimeLock VR 2
summary: TimeLock VR 2 - the player must free the soul of the ancestor, imprisoned by the sorcerer in stone. To travel in timeyou will need to create spells. Time travel will take place in different eras of the past.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I Rainstorm
summary: In this game , Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks

name: Tiny Legends
summary: Get ready for an epic adventure to defend your kingdom from goblins and their dark spirits! Build towers, command your troops, and adapt your strategy through storms, snow, and night battles. Upgrade your forces and strike back into goblin lands to uncover their secret and take your revenge!

name: Tiles in Time
summary: Enter this challenge in which you must paint all the tiles before reaching the last one in the shortest time possible. Visit different worlds and face different puzzles which will test all your skills.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Winter Assault MP046
summary: "Tiger Tank 59 I Winter Assault" is a top-down shooting gameIn this game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 046.

name: Time Jump
summary:
A casual 3rd person action-adventure

Play as William Roger in this 3rd person comedy adventure. It's 1994. You're late for school! No sleep. No Breakfast. You "accidentally" activate your professors “Camera” and get sucked into the past.

Lost and alone in this strange place with your wits and no knowledge of where to go next, uncover the many mysteries of why you are here and at all costs, find your way back home before time runs out.

name: Time Space Rebuild
summary: In "Time Rebuild", human civilization stands on the brink of destruction. You will become a time-traveling hero, embarking on a journey to save the world while encountering and bonding with women of vastly different appearances and personalities.

name: Time to Morp
summary: Time to Morp is a colony sim game in which you take care of playful creatures - Morps. Use their skills to gather resources, build pipe networks, automate everything and explore the world to find new species and rare materials.

name: Time Breaker
summary: Immerse yourself in the multidimensional universe of Desordre. Solve intricate puzzles, push the boundaries of 4-dimensional thinking. Get ready for a unique experience where reflection takes on a whole new dimension

name: Time Flipper
summary: Press one button to switch between timelines, this is your time-flip device, use it to find the missing people and convince them to follow you. Lead them out by switching the world state. Enemies will attack you but you carry no weapons, escape the violence by switching between timelines.

name: Ticket to Ride
summary: The cross-country train-adventure game is on its way! It's a fresh take on the iconic board game in stunning 3D. Play with friends, family and players of all ages around the world. Drive your enterprise from coast to coast and strategise as lines collide and direct routes grow!

name: Time Rift
summary: Time Rift is a fast-paced puzzle-shooter, crash through causality and rewind time to escape from the 60 stages of Speedjail. Thinking fast, avoiding traps and a steady aim will only get you so far - to beat Time Rift you’ll have to manipulate the flow of time!

name: Titanic: Adventure out of Time
summary:
Titanic: Adventure Out of Time is a computer game developed by Cyberflix. It was published in the United States and Europe by GTE Entertainment and Europress respectively, and released on November 12, 1996. The game is a point-and-click adventure game which sees the player traveling around a virtual representation of the RMS Titanic.
Titanic: Adventure Out of Time comes in three versions: a PC, Macintosh, or hybrid version that works on both the Windows and Mac. Version 1.0 of the game is an upgrade of the game from GTE Entertainment to just Cyberflix and is a stability upgrade first released in 1997. It comes in either a threefold CD jacket or a jewel case version. The French and German version of the game comes in two paper sleeves. The Mac and Windows versions were released first, produced by Cyberflix and distributed by GTE Entertainment in 1996. Hybrid versions of the game, which are compatible with both the Mac and Windows operating systems, were distributed and produced by Cyberflix after GTE Entertainment went out of business in 1997. Later versions were distributed by Hammerhead Entertainment, who took over production after Cyberflix also went out of business in 1998. The game is available in seven languages: English, French, German, Dutch, Russian, Polish and Korean.
Characters in Titanic: Adventure Out of Time were rendered by way of photographs of actors given limited animation in sync with dialogue. The producers of this game used this same style of rendering for a previous adventure entitled Dust: A Tale of the Wired West.

name: Ticket to Ride: India
summary: Embark on a tour of Ian Vincent's India and discover one of the most densely populated and colorful countries of the world. The year is 1911, and the world is changing fast in the British Raj. Will you complete your Grand Tour in time, or lose to more cunning – or simply better connected – opponents?

name: Timber and Stone
summary: Timber and Stone is a voxel-based sandbox city building game with a heavy emphasis on combat, fortifications, and siege warfare. While you build your humble village into a mighty castle town, you will be bombarded with waves of monsters that are either working together or fighting amongst each other.

name: Tiny Jump
summary: Tiny Jump is a first person precision platformer, The main goal of the game is to climb all the way to the top while facing difficult types of jumps & challenges, Tiny Jump is for those who are looking for difficult and challenging gameplay.

name: Tiny Bunny
summary: Tiny Bunny is a non-linear horror visual novel. Those, who have heard the voice of the forest, are beyond help.

name: Tic Tac
summary: Cooperate in this two-player action-platformer and pass the bomb to each other to reach the goal before it explodes. Activate mechanisms, avoid traps, and complete dynamic challenges together across cartoony levels.

name: Tiki Tiki: The Tropical Memory Game
summary: Tiki Tiki: The Tropical Memory Game is a family friendly memory game where all can improve their memory, speed of thinking. With 3 game modes and 3 difficulties its the perfect way to train your brain.

name: Tin Hearts
summary: Guide squads of tin soldiers to safety through this magical toy filled world. A beautiful VR puzzle game with a heartfelt story. Are you guiding the soldiers or are they guiding you?

name: Tin & Kuna
summary: Spin and smash through the colorful, chaotic worlds of Tin & Kuna. Explore levels filled with puzzles and peril.

name: Time Flies
summary: This whimsical game is part open world and part flight simulator – and you play it as a fly! You are provided with a bucket list that you can complete before you die. But the life of a fly is short – and the list is long! Go ahead and learn an instrument, become rich, read a book, go on tour, find yourself, get drunk, make someone laugh or enter the art world! And if you don’t feel like pursuing your life goals, just hang, clean your wings, listen to music or watch television. Make the best of the time you have! Because we are all going to die.

name: Titanclimb
summary: Embark on an adventure to save the "Titan," a colossal creature you must climb to heal. Overcome alien ecosystems and harsh weather to uncover the Titan's secrets. An epic tale of life and connection awaits beyond breathtaking vistas.

name: Times & Galaxy
summary: Embark on an interplanetary adventure as the first robo reporter for the Times & Galaxy, the solar system's most trusted holopaper. You're just an intern, but if you can get the scoop, write great stories, and impress your colleagues, maybe you'll get to keep your job!

name: Titan Souls
summary: Titan Souls is an indie action-adventure game centered around battling powerful bosses in a minimalist world. Players are equipped with a single arrow and one hit point, emphasizing precision, timing, and strategic movement. The game features pixel-art visuals, atmospheric environments, and a focus on trial-and-error gameplay.

name: Tidal Tribe
summary: In classical god game fashion, Tidal Tribe gives you the power to shape the terrain. Raise and lower the land to protect your village from floods and waves, all while using that very same water to build lakes and rivers, turning the desert land into a lush forest of trees and bushes.

name: Timothy and the Mysterious Forest
summary: Timothy and the Mysterious Forest is a mix of old-school Game Boy graphics, meta-narrative, stealth system and action combat with an high difficulty level. Elements from adventure/exploration games are mixed with puzzle and stealth: exploration, reading and keeping a slow pace is the best tactic. Multiple endings!

name: Titanium Hound
summary: Titanium Hound is retro-looking video game in cyberpunk genre, where you are going to pilot huge and agile exoskeleton to crush hordes of crazed security drones and abominations to uncover conspiracy carefully crafted by one of global corporations.

name: Ticket to Ride: Classic Edition
summary: Connect more than cities! Set off with your friends and family to re(discover) Ticket to Ride: Classic Edition, the classic boardgame. In this railway adventure, you’ll need to be the quickest to link up your cities and reach your destinations.

name: Time From Earth
summary:
Time From Earth is a narrative adventure game where you'll experience a day-to-day system, speaking to everyone & completing tasks and at the end of the day, head back to the accommodation to start the next day.

Play through simple mini-games to help maintain the ship and learn about what's happened in the 30 years between now and the flight of Physis 5.
Uncover a mystery onboard the ship...

name: Titan Chaser
summary: Car. Foggy night. Mystical landscapes. And if you want to work - titans. Titan Chaser is a surreal driving and walking experience, where your job is to scout giant creatures and use the light to drive them off without fighting or killing.

name: Tiny Tina's Assault on Dragon Keep: A Wonderlands One-shot Adventure
summary: Smash skeletons, defeat dragons, and battle giant golems in Tiny Tina's Assault on Dragon Keep: A Wonderlands One-Shot Adventure. Experience the acclaimed 2013 quest jam-packed with fantasy, fun, and mountains of magical loot!

name: Tiger Jenny
summary:
Tiger Jenny is a NES game set in the same universe as "Ittle Dew" it takes place a thousand years before the events of that game.
Battle your way through the forests to seek vengeance on the Turnip Witch who dwells in her castle.

Note that this game actually runs on the real hardware, it's not just an imitation.
Therefore the release is in nes rom format so you'll need an emulator to play it.

name: Time Travel: Escape Room Game
summary: Your help is essential in this time travel machine game!

name: Tired of Being the Hero
summary: As a retired hero, lead and train your villagers to stand against relentless monster attacks. Assign roles, motivate your team, upgrade townsfolk, unlock powerful abilities, and adapt your strategy to outlast the next assault. TBH is a first-person fantasy action RPG with a strategy twist.

name: Tireless: Prepare For the Adrenaline
summary: Tireless is a Challenging Sci-fi 3D Platformer that takes speed to cosmic levels. As a 'Pacer' robot in space, master movement and evade obstacles at extreme speeds. Easy to pick up but challenging to dominate, this skill-based game offers a thrilling experience, relying solely on your expertise to conquer each meticulously designed level. Enjoy seamless gameplay with responsive controls and complete freedom of movement, offering a truly off-the-rails experience.

name: Tiebreak
